name: DasCold Jump and Run
description:
Small Jump and Run I made within a week on my own with Unity Asset Store assets in 2018. Kinda psychodelic vibe. Made it in 2017 but it's too weird to not upload it somewhere. The game is dedicated to a small Twitch streamer: https://www.twitch.tv/dascold

Four levels in total:

  • Tutorial Level
  • Hub-Level
  • Bavaria Level
  • Creepy Level
